subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Poet Norbert Krapf recently returned from New York to the renascent downtown of Indianapolis. He recites his poems in jazz joints and coffeehouses in Indy and is gaga over the Colts.
snippet: Poet Norbert Krapf recently returned from New York to the renascent downtown of Indianapolis. He recites his poems in jazz joints and coffeehouses in Indy and is gaga over the Colts.
